pageNotFound.title: 404 - Page not found
pageNotFound.message: Oops, we weren't able to find the page you requested.

errorCode.noResponse: Oops, there was no response from the server.
errorCode.notLoggedIn: You need to login to call the service.
errorCode.notFound: Oops, we were not able to find the service.
errorCode.redirection: Oops, we got a redirection error.
errorCode.retryFailure: Oops, we got a temporary error from the service but were unable to recover. Try again later.

settingsFlyout.title: System settings
settingsFlyout.simulationDescription: Start or stop simulation of devices. Stopping device simulation will minimize the cost of the solution; no simulated telemetry will be sent to your IoT Hub and alerts will not be generated for simulated devices.

applicationSettings.nameLogoDescription: Edit logo and name in the site header.
applicationSettings.logoDescription:
Recommended logo size: 24 x 24 px.
Maximum logo size: 300 KB.
Supported file formats:
	.SVG
	.PNG
	.JPEG
	.JPG
applicationSettings.uploadError: Unable to upload file, please check the file type/size and try again.

column.auditappiddescription: A unique ID for each AMT Role
column.eventIddescription: ID of an event of the application
column.auditappdescription: The role group name for each AMT functional area
column.eventdescription: ID of an event of the application
column.timedescription: Server time to indicate the event occurance

messages.kvmNotEnabledAndNotPoweredUp: Power on remote computer and check the KVM enable to connect to KVM
messages.notPoweredUp: Remote computer is not powered on.
messages.kvmNotEnabled: Check the KVM enable to connect to KVM
messages.solNotEnabledAndNotPoweredUp: Power on remote computer and check the SOL enable to connect to SOL
messages.solNotEnabled: Check the SOL enable to connect to SOL
messages.failedToFetch: Failed to fetch the {{translate.feature}} feature status
messages.failedKvmFetchAndNotPoweredUp: Unable to fetch KVM features and device is not powered on
messages.failedSolFetchAndNotPoweredUp: Unable to fetch SOL features and device is not powered on
messages.failedSolFetchAndFailedPowerFetch: Unable to fetch SOL features and device power status
messages.solNotEnabledAndFailedPowerFetch: Check the SOL enable to connect to SOL and failed to fetch power status
messages.failedKvmFetchAndFailedPowerFetch: Unable to fetch KVM features and device power status
messages.kvmNotEnabledAndFailedPowerFetch: Check the KVM enable to connect to KVM and failed to fetch power status
messages.failedPowerFetch: Failed to fetch the power status

errors.profileNameValidation: Profile name contains letters, numbers and special characters.
errors.amtPassword: Generate Random Password (or) AMT Password is required.
errors.amtPasswordValidation: Amt password should contains lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one numeric digit, and one special character and password length should be in between 8 to 32.
errors.randomPasswordValidation: Random password length should be in between 8 to 32.

errors.commonNameValidation: Common name is required field and contains letters,numbers and . characters.
errors.passwordValidation: Password is required field should contains atleast one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one numeric digit,and one special character and password length should be in between 8 to 32.
errors.userNameValidation: User name is required field and contains letters, numbers and special characters.
errors.portValidation: Port is required and should be a numeric value between 1024 and 49151
errors.configNameValidation: Config name is required field and contains letters, numbers and special characters.
errors.mpsCertFetchError: Failed to fetch the certificate from the server. Please try to enter the certificate manually by switching the Mps root certificate format option.
errors.mpsServerMismatchError: MPS server address does not match with base URL of the application. Please try to enter the certificate manually by switching the Mps root certificate format option.

error.nameValidation: Name is a required field and contains letters, numbers and special characters.
error.domainSuffixValidation: Domain suffix is a required field
error.provisioningCertStorageFormatValidation: Provisioning Cert Storage Format is a required field
error.provisioningCertValidation: Provisioning cert is a required field
error.provisioningCertPasswordValidation: Provisioning Cert Password is required field should contains atleast one lowercase letter,  one uppercase letter, one numeric digit,and one special character and password length should be in between 8 to 32.
